Brazil: The Kingdom of Portugal reunites its South American colonies of the State of Brazil, the State of Great-Pará, and the State of Maranhão into the Colony of Brazil. Rio de Janeiro is the capital.
Burma:
Lan Na (Chiang Mai) revolts, seeks and receives Siamese help.
Hsinbyushin raises the Shwedagon Pagoda to its present height
Another Burmese invasion of Siam fails; Southern Lan Na becomes Siamese vassal (to 1776)
England: War of American Independence officially starts with the battles of Lexington and Concord. Lasts until 1789.
